artist: Painter: After Gabriël Metsu; Engraver: Robert Brichet
description: a Dutch exterior at left a woman in black wearing a veil and cloak with a long pointed white collar and carrying a bucket over her PR arm; at center a woman holding a dead chicken; at right a man seated on a keg smoking a long pipe; a dog at center foreground
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: 56 /  Metsu Pinx.   Brichet sc. / Du Cabiner de Mr. Poullain | on sheet in pencil: 2-59
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain,  plate 56
title: Print
